scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel src/__dev__.html --out-dir dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build --no-source-maps src/*.njk --out-dir build/ --public-url .
scripts.build-with-cache: npm run clean:cache && npm run build && npm run cache
scripts.deploy-prep: echo dett.cc > build/CNAME && cp -r .circleci build && mkdir -p build/assets/ && cp src/assets/meta.png build/assets
scripts.deploy-test: npm run deploy-prep && gh-pages -d build -m "Automated deployment to GitHub Pages: Test" -t
scripts.deploy-ci: npm run deploy-prep && gh-pages -d build -m "Automated deployment to GitHub Pages: ${CIRCLE_SHA1}" -t
